1682350.name: Save Yourself!
1682350.description:
Have you ever wondered what you would do in extreme situations? What would you do if a fire broke out inside a high-rise building? How would you escape a sinking ship? It is up to your wits and resourcefulness, whether you’ll be able find an escape route and survive. Check your location thoroughly, use your flair and the objects found near you. Save yourself!

  • Find objects that will help you survive. Use them to make gadgets necessary for survival.
  • Beware all the elements – earth, air, water and fire.
  • Face gravity.
  • Solve numerous riddles, in order to find an escape route.
  • Use the found vehicles, to escape the threat.
1682350.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
